abilities.desc: At the start of each ally's turn, if they are within Range of you or your Copies, they may heal.
abilities.trigger: at the start of each ally's turn

abilities.desc: At the end of your turn, choose an ally you can see other than yourself. They heal and gain Shield 2.
abilities.trigger: at the end of your turn

actions.name: Group Up
actions.desc:
Pull up to 3 to one ally you can see.
3+: Pull up to 3 to one ally you can see.
5+, Once per turn: Choose one to apply to each ally within range: Heal; -or- Gain 2 Power tokens; -or- Gain Shield 3.
